metadata.title: CVE-2022-31783 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Liblouis 3.21.0 has an out-of-bounds write in compileRule incompileTranslationTable.c, as demonstrated by lou_trace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 3.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
liblouis20 - 3.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 3.12.0-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.12.0-3ubuntu0.1').
